name: customizable-cinnamon
description: Customizable theme for the Cinnamon Desktop Environment

scripts.reload: gsettings set org.cinnamon.theme name default && gsettings set org.cinnamon.theme name Customizable-Cinnamon
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build && npm run reload' Customizable-Cinnamon/cinnamon/sass
